Plot: A group of Sudanese refugees given the chance to resettle in America arrive in Kansas City, Missouri, where their encounter with an employment agency counselor forever changes all of their lives.
Title: The Good Lie
Actors: Reese Witherspoon, Arnold Oceng, Ger Duany, Emmanuel Jal
tomatoConsensus: The Good Lie sacrifices real-life nuance in order to turn its true story into a Hollywood production, but the results still add up to a compelling, well-acted, and deeply moving drama.
